alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 11:47AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Some agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow and continue rising to a crest of 17.5 feet Friday. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
